Just got this tsuba. Needs some boning and fussing, but I'm wondering 
about school. I think probably either Kyo-sukashi or Owari. However, 
what may be iron bones on the mimi just look like rust bumps, so I 
lean toward Kyo-sukashi. 76mm x 3mm.
Maybe some other school altogether?
Any thoughts appreciated. 

http://gcclearn.gcc.vccs.edu/stein/tsuba.jpg

Thanks
Rich S
